request.positivePrompt: Scene: A sunlit clearing with an elderly woman sitting on a log, an old map booklet open on her lap. Character Frau Müller: 78-year-old woman, professional distinctive face, dark hair, warm expression, green-gray-beige palette—consistent in all scenes; wearing modest, practical clothing. Characters Adrian and Alexander nearby, interacting with her map. Environment: soft grass, light filtering like ribbons, scattered herbs and an old wooden log, map with hand-drawn notes. Mood: wise, protective, warm. Lighting: warm center light, soft edges. Camera perspective: medium shot focusing on interaction and map details. Action verbs: sitting, pointing, scribbling, listening. Recurring motifs: light bands and a musical motif drawn on the map. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly. CHARACTERS IN THIS SCENE: Adrian: 5-7 years old, male, warm golden blond short curly voluminous tousled curls hair, bright blue eyes, pale peach skin, wearing casual hoodie over white crewneck shirt, voluminous curly golden hair, large expressive bright blue eyes, rosy round childlike cheeks, small button-shaped nose, gentle small smiling mouth, prominent rounded ears slightly visible, soft pale warm skin, innocent empathetic friendly expression Alexander: 8-10 years old, male, medium brown short straight with slight wave tousled, slightly spiky at crown hair, bright green eyes, light warm peach skin, wearing casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, short tousled brown hair, large bright green eyes, round youthful face, rosy button nose, small smiling mouth, light freckles and blush, slim neck and shoulders, expressive arched eyebrows, soft natural lighting Frau Müller: Frau Müller • ['Frau Müller', ' 78 years'] IMPORTANT: Characters listed from youngest to oldest. Maintain size relationships - Adrian (5-7y) must be SMALLER than any older character. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly
